stats.title: üìä Usage Statistics
stats.noStatsHint: Use some templates on the Pixiv page to start collecting data!

shortcuts.title: ‚å®Ô∏è Configure Keyboard Shortcuts
shortcuts.hint: üí° Click on a field and press the desired key combination.
shortcuts.hintModifiers: Use Ctrl/Cmd, Shift, Alt + a key.
shortcuts.applyTemplateDesc: Applies the template corresponding to the position in the list

help.title: ‚å®Ô∏è KEYBOARD SHORTCUTS - PIXIV TEMPLATER
help.configHint: Click the "‚å®Ô∏è Shortcuts" button in the panel to customize shortcuts!
help.tip: üí° TIP: Shortcuts work anywhere on the upload page!

dashboard.title: Pixiv Templater - Settings
dashboard.noTemplatesHint: Create your first template to get started!
dashboard.togglePanelDesc: Shows or hides the panel on the Pixiv page
dashboard.minimizePanelDesc: Minimizes the side panel on the Pixiv page
dashboard.newTemplateDesc: Opens the modal to create a new template
dashboard.exportTemplatesDesc: Exports all templates to a JSON file
dashboard.importTemplatesDesc: Imports templates from a JSON file
dashboard.shortcutsHint: Click on a field to record a new shortcut. Press the desired keys (e.g.: Ctrl+Shift+T).

advanced.autoTranslateTagsDesc: Automatically translate Japanese tags to English on the upload page
advanced.title: Advanced Settings
advanced.debugModeDesc: Enables detailed logs in the browser console for troubleshooting.
advanced.debugModeWarning: ‚ö†Ô∏è May affect performance. Use only for debugging.
advanced.clearAllDataDesc: Removes all templates, statistics, and extension settings.
advanced.storageInfoDesc: Space used by the extension in the browser.

about.title: About
about.description: Pixiv Templater is an extension that makes uploading works to Pixiv easier.
about.description2: It allows you to create reusable templates with titles, descriptions, tags, and predefined settings.
about.feature2: ‚ö° Quick application with one click or keyboard shortcut
about.feature4: üîû Age rating settings (All ages, R-18, R-18G)
about.step1: Access the Pixiv upload page: pixiv.net/illustration/create
about.step2: The Pixiv Templater panel will appear automatically in the corner of the page
about.step3: Click on a template to apply it to the form
about.step4: Use ALT+Shift+T to see all available shortcuts
about.step5: Manage your templates on this settings page
about.author: Author
about.authorCredit: Created with ‚ù§Ô∏è to make life easier for artists on Pixiv

form.workTitlePlaceholder: Title that will appear on the work
form.tagsPlaceholder: Type a tag and press Enter
form.adultContentHint: ‚ö†Ô∏è If there's nothing adult/suggestive, leave unchecked
form.matureCategoriesHint: ‚ö†Ô∏è If there are none, leave unchecked
